meanings.definition: Software that is distributed free of charge but requires payment for full use.
meanings.sent1: I downloaded some shareware to try out before deciding if I want to buy it.
meanings.sent2: Many developers rely on shareware to make a living in the software industry.
meanings.sent3: The shareware was like a sneak peek into the full version of the program.
meanings.sent4: Using shareware is like tasting a sample before committing to the whole meal.
meanings.sent5: The concept of shareware is similar to borrowing a book from the library.

meanings.definition: To distribute software on a trial basis for free.
meanings.sent1: Developers often shareware their programs to attract more users.
meanings.sent2: I will shareware the new app to gather feedback before the official release.
meanings.sent3: He decided to shareware his game to build a community of players.
meanings.sent4: She plans to shareware the software to gauge interest from potential customers.
meanings.sent5: The company will shareware the application to test its functionality with a wider audience.
